thread.title: Top U.S. commander recommends revising Afghan drawdown plan PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Top U.S. commander recommends revising Afghan drawdown plan | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Top U.S. commander recommends revising Afghan drawdown plan PBS NewsHour
text: Gen. John Campbell acknowledged at a Senate Armed Services hearing that a strike against a target that turned out to be a Doctors Without Borders hospital was an American decision, made within the U.S. chain of command. Campbell also said he's proposed extending the U.S. presence in Afghanistan beyond the 2016 deadline laid out by the president. Judy Woodruff reports.
